epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options, modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.time_representativeness: 2022 calendar year production data for plant, 2025 for mix data
lca_information.databases_and_software: SimaPro® LCA software (v 9.5), AusLCI v1.42 (2023), Ecoinvent 3.9.1 (2023)
lca_information.allocation: Physical and economic allocation based on weight and cost
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: No energy or mass flows excluded except packaging
lca_information.data_quality: Good or very good geographic and temporal representativeness

transport_and_installation.distribution: Transported by EUROS 28t-32t trucks, 14.52 km distance

carbon_emission_context.global_co2_emissions: 39% from building environment, 11% from construction materials
carbon_emission_context.2050_target: Net zero for new construction materials

recycled_materials_handling.allocation_approach: AusLCI LCA database default for secondary data

references: General Programme Instructions (GPI) for the International EPD System V4.0
